title: Store is not working
body: So I have tried restarting and waiting this out but my store (even with the right amount of IP) will not allow me to purchase a mystery champion shard for hextech.......any help? I do have screen shots as well.

replies.body:
Try launching into the Legacy Client from the login screen then head to the store and attempt the purchase again.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!
